mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction( buyer_id , demailaddr , dlvy_date , dlvy_request, order_data, payment_option, prod_no , receiver_name , receiver_phone, tran_status_code,tran_no, is_purchase_code, quantity) VALUES ( #{buyer.userId} , #{divyAddr:VARCHAR} , #{divyDate:DATE} , #{divyRequest:VARCHAR} , SYSDATE, #{paymentOption:VARCHAR} , #{purchaseProd.prodNo} , #{receiverName:VARCHAR} , #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR} , #{tranCode:VARCHAR} , seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval, #{isPurchaseCode:NUMERIC} , #{purQuantity:NUMERIC} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM( SELECT pr.prod_no, pr.prod_name, pr.price,tr.quantity,tr.tran_no, tr.receiver_name, tr.receiver_phone, tr.tran_status_code, tr.is_purchase_code FROM transaction tr, product pr WHERE tr.prod_no = pr.prod_no AND tr.buyer_id= #{buyerId} ORDER BY tran_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT pr.prod_no, pr.prod_name, pr.price,tr.quantity,tr.tran_no, tr.receiver_name, tr.receiver_phone, tr.tran_status_code, tr.is_purchase_code FROM transaction tr, product pr WHERE tr.prod_no = pr.prod_no AND tr.buyer_id= #{value}) countTable
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE prod_no = #{prodNo}) countTable
